metadata.title: Authentic 256 Odu Cards - User Excel Data

cards.name: ÈJÌOGBÈ
cards.meaning: Light, clarity, divine wisdom, new beginnings
cards.pattern:
II II
II II
II II
II II
cards.guidance: The sacred energy of ÈJÌOGBÈ brings light, clarity, divine wisdom, new beginnings. Allow this to illuminate your spiritual path.
cards.guidanceYoruba: Ọgbọ́n ÈJÌOGBÈ ni kí a gbà. Àṣẹ!
cards.proverb: Through ÈJÌOGBÈ, the ancestors speak to us.
cards.proverbYoruba: Ògbon ÈJÌOGBÈ ńlá ni. Àṣẹ ó!
cards.modernApplication: Apply the wisdom of light, clarity, divine wisdom, new beginnings in your daily meditation, decision-making, and spiritual practice.
cards.traditionalStory: In ancient times, the Odu ÈJÌOGBÈ was revealed to guide humanity through times of challenge and growth.

Èṣù.traditionalStory: In ancient times, the Odu ÌRÈTÈ-ÒṢÉ was revealed to guide humanity through times of challenge and growth.
